title: Urgent ||C3.AI | Solution Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech from IIT
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: Product based startup
Date of the Offer:  25ht November 2024
Current Compensation: 30(fixed) + 4(variable)
Company: C3.AI
Title/Level: Solution Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 26 LPA
Stock bonus: 50LPA / 5years
Joining Bonus: 6LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):~42LPA
Benefits: Standard benefits
Work Mode: 5days work from office 

PLEASE Help me out with the pointers to negotiate and what should I expect and settle for. How should I negotiate. I think I am low ball

title: C3.AI | Solution Engineer | Bangalore | Offer Declined
content:
Education: Btech NIT ECE
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at a Fintech Company
Previous Comp: 19LPA Fixed + 1 LPA Variable
Date of the Offer: November 2024
Company: C3.AI
Title/Level: Solution Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 25LPA Fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NIL
Stock bonus: 2000 Units(75K USD) vesting for 5 year
Variable Bonus: 0-15% of Base based on performance
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42 LPA (Stock+Salary+Variable(assuming 10%)) + 
Benefits: Standard(You will be paid 1000/1500 USD for completing one Coursera course)


Rejected the offer was having better offer.
PS: Work from office for 5 Days and heard negative about the company.

title: Microsoft | SDE-2 L61 | Offer | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier 2 Btech
Years of Experience: 3.5 YOE
Title: SDE-1 at Fintech MNC
Current : 24L Base + 2L Variable Bonus + 4L Retention = 30LPA


Date of the Offer: November 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE2 (L61)
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 30 LPA
Signing Bonus: 4 + 1.5 L
Stock bonus: 45K USD (Over 4 years)
Perf Bonus: 0-20 % of Base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 30 + (4 + 1.5 + 3 (taking 10 % as Perf Bonus)) + 9.5 = 48 LPA
Benefits: Whatever microsoft offers

Is this a good offer?

title: Microsoft | Bangalore | Offer | Nov 2024
content:

Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE II (L61)

Stock bonus: 45K USD vesting for 4 year
Variable Bonus: 0-20% of Base based on performance

Is this a good offer?
